price: The people of Noah rejected [their messengers] before them, as did ‘Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes[10];
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
footnotes: [10] It refers to the stakes by which he used to torture people, or the pyramids which are like stakes into the earth.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
